Special: Unreliable

Note: Not a True Bolt Weapon, but rather a crude imitation which is sometimes peddled as one. If it Jams an Explosive Mishap Occurs. Uses Custom Unstable Ammunition (Scarce, 5 Thrones/Clip), which has a 65% chance of exploding if hit by an explosion or flame weapon (dealing 1d10+3 X Damage)
